summary: Admin login is failing after removing Internet Identity; system now uses email+password but lacks a working initial admin bootstrap/creation path (tokens no longer match), requiring a backend change to create the first admin account.
architectural_notes: Internet Identity was removed; authentication is now intended to be email + password.
Current 'Grant Admin Access' / initialization token bootstrap mechanism appears incompatible with the updated build (token mismatch).
known_issues: Admin login returns 'Invalid email or password' because no admin account exists in the database yet.
'Grant Admin Access' token-based bootstrap is failing due to tokens not matching the updated version after Internet Identity removal.

existing_features.title: In the admin login screen UI, remove or disable the token-based "First-Time Setup" / "Grant Admin Access" bootstrap section since it is currently failing and the intended flow is direct email + password login; keep the email/password login form as the only admin access path presented to users.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement a reliable initial admin creation/bootstrap flow for email+password login (no outdated tokens), so first admin can be created and log in successfully.

Update the backend admin credentials to match the provided first admin account so that email/password login succeeds immediately: set `adminEmail` to `fitting.point.official@gmail.com` and `adminPassword` to `Farhan@456`, and ensure `authenticateAdminWithEmailPassword(email, password)` grants the caller the `#admin` role when those credentials match.

projectName: Fix admin email/password login by hardcoding first admin credentials and removing broken token bootstrap UI
